text: In Dabhoi, will lay the foundation stone for the National Tribal Freedom Fighters’ Museum.
In Amreli, market yard of APMC & plant of Amar Dairy would be inaugurated. Foundation stone of a honey production centre would also be laid.
Looking forward to addressing a gathering of cooperatives, Sahakar Sammelan in Amreli tomorrow.
Went to R&R Hospital to see Marshal of the Indian Air Force Arjan Singh, who is critically ill. I also met his family members.
We are all praying for the speedy recovery of Marshal of the Indian Air Force Arjan Singh. Doctors are doing their best.
India mourns the unfortunate demise of Marshal of the Indian Air Force Arjan Singh. We remember his outstanding service to the nation.pic.twitter.com/8eUcvoPuH1
Marshal of the IAF Arjan Singh’s determined focus on capacity building in the IAF added great strength to our defence capabilities.
India will never forget the excellent leadership of Marshal of the IAF Arjan Singh in 1965, when the IAF saw substantial action.
Sometime back I met him, who despite his ill health tried to get up to salute even though I said no. Such was his soldier discipline.
My thoughts are with his family & those mourning the demise of a distinguished air warrior & fine human, Marshal of the IAF Arjan Singh. RIP
Vishwakarma Jayanti Greetings to everyone.pic.twitter.com/tT9ROM7pbo
From the land of Bapu and Sardar Patel, the Sardar Sarovar Dam is dedicated to the nation today. This will benefit crores of citizens.pic.twitter.com/gZKYbkMFPh
We recall the vision of Sardar Patel, who envisioned the Dam & Dr. Ambedkar, who as Minister did pioneering work on irrigation & waterways.
Some pictures from Kevadia, where the Sardar Sarovar Dam was dedicated to the nation.pic.twitter.com/TU33NABKNs
Reviewed the construction of the 'Statue of Unity', a tribute to Sardar Patel.pic.twitter.com/tpsv4hRRHP
Visited the residence of Marshal of the IAF Arjan Singh to pay tributes to him & extended condolences to his family members.pic.twitter.com/rpzbavzj5z
At the Sahakar Sammelan in Amreli, talked about the importance of cooperative sector for farmers.http://nm-4.com/5bf5
Also talked about how the Blue Revolution & Sweet Revolution will bring tremendous advantages for the poor and farmers of Saurashtra.
Inaugurated the market yard of APMC at Amreli.pic.twitter.com/ZiZEayA96X
Inaugurated the Amar Dairy. We have worked tirelessly to create the right environment for the setting up of dairies across Saurashtra.pic.twitter.com/SaNjLF6rm1
Earlier today, addressed a large public meeting in Dabhoi. Here is my speech on the occasion.http://nm-4.com/yaf5

Thank you for your good wishes Mr. Karzai.
I thank everyone for the birthday wishes. Your blessings inspire me to work harder & serve India with greater energy.
I specially appreciate all those who took part in cleanliness activities & other social service initiatives across India yesterday.
Narmada Chetri from Assam’s prize winning painting is themed on the need for more and more people to join Swachh Bharat Mission.pic.twitter.com/rgp8uAgcvN
Shubho Mahalaya! I pray that the festive season furthers the atmosphere of peace, prosperity and happiness in our society.
Had a wonderful interaction with the family members of Bharat Ratna M.S. Subbulakshmi. http://nm-4.com/2of5 pic.twitter.com/g3ERgAoTlk
Ms. Aishwarya and Ms. Saundarya, M.S. Subbulakshmi’s great grand daughters performed the "Maithreem Bhajatha.”pic.twitter.com/3MA8CLFdc5
You would be interested to know that the "Maithreem Bhajatha” was rendered by M.S. Subbulakshmi at the United Nations in 1966.
Monmaya Sonar from West Kameng, Arunachal Pradesh won a prize for this artwork, in which she has illustrated a Swachh Bharat. @swachhbharatpic.twitter.com/9SSPlyT1o1

Shana Tova my dear friend @netanyahu. 
שנה טובה ידידי היקר
नवरात्रि के पावन पर्व पर देशवासियों को हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं। Navratri greetings to everyone.
On the first day of Navratri, we pray to Maa Shailputri. Here is a Stuti devoted to her. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NhLxnY1deYc&feature=youtu.be …pic.twitter.com/pEGGA7QuVy
On the occasion of Mera Chaoren Houba, my best wishes to the people on Manipur. May this festival further the spirit of harmony in society.
Through this prize winning painting Kapil Meena from Udaipur showcases how public participation can result in a clean village. @swachhbharatpic.twitter.com/bWlCveZvsI
As a part of the birth centenary celebrations of Shri Laxmanrao Inamdar, addressed a Sahakar Sammelan in Delhi.http://nm-4.com/jyf5
Paid tributes to Shri Laxmanrao Inamdar, a distinguished personality with whom I had a very close interaction & learnt so much from.pic.twitter.com/TFlIHQnODK
Spoke about the need to preserve the spirit of cooperative movements & how cooperatives can expand into more areas for benefit of citizens.
Met the family members of Shri Laxmanrao Inamdar.pic.twitter.com/xjRcwCkREt
Tomorrow I begin my Varanasi visit, during which various development works will be launched.http://nm-4.com/i0f5
The Deendayal Hastkala Sankul, a trade facilitation centre for handicrafts will be dedicated to the nation.
Tomorrow the Mahamana Express will be flagged off, which connects Varanasi to Vadodara and Surat.
Other projects to be inaugurated include Utkarsh Bank, which specialises in micro finance, Jal Ambulance service and Jal Shav Vahan service.
I look forward to praying at the historic Tulsi Manas Temple & Durga Mata Temple. A postage stamp on the Ramayana will also be released.
On 23rd, shall join a sanitation related activity in Shahanshahpur, visit a Pashudhan Arogya Mela and address a public meeting.
On Day 2 of Navratri we pray to Maa Brahmacharini for her continuous blessings. Here is a Stuti. https://youtu.be/RxKQq4sVhPU pic.twitter.com/FbNYrXTxhM
Birthday greetings to Sikkim CM Shri Pawan Chamling. I pray for his long and healthy life.
All must come together for a @swachhbharat...this is the message from the award winning artwork by Arnab Jyoti Rajkhowa from Sibsagar, Assampic.twitter.com/mJGpO2N0ep
Delighted to inaugurate a series of development works in Kashi. Sharing my speech on the occasion.http://nm-4.com/35f5
Deendayal Hastkala Sankul, a trade facilitation centre for handicrafts will give a strong impetus to the sector.pic.twitter.com/uMuKvB2tma
Mahamana Express connects Varanasi & Vadodara, both vibrant cultural centres as well as Varanasi & Surat, both vibrant textile centres.pic.twitter.com/3t7GISk5nK
Jal Ambulance and Jal Shav Vahini Sewa are innovative initiatives that will add convenience in people’s lives.
Through the Utkarsh Bank, the aspirations of the poor will get wings and their dreams will be fulfilled.pic.twitter.com/gYCqjoUeVY
Released postage stamps on the Ramayana.pic.twitter.com/E6wYPh2hmy
Honoured to pray at the Tulsi Manas Mandir, one of Kashi’s historical temples.pic.twitter.com/7RYqFVl59Q
From the Darshan at the Durga Mata Temple and visit to Durga Kund.pic.twitter.com/bstURnNdYB

We bow to Maa Chandraghanta on the 3rd day of Navratri & seek her blessings for joy & strength. Here is a Stuti. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eb_SC7TWGOA&feature=youtu.be …pic.twitter.com/myI1jJsex4
Beautiful painting by Chonkai Monwangham from Changlang, Arunachal Pradesh on a @swachhbharat by 2019.pic.twitter.com/97qYyRldpH
As a part of #SwachhataHiSeva movement, did Shramdan for the construction of a twin pit toilet at Shahanshahpur, Varanasi.pic.twitter.com/53WDxYL7nq
Let us actively participate in the movement towards a Swachh Bharat and fulfil Mahatma Gandhi's dream. @swachhbharat
Visited a Pashudhan Arogya Mela on Day 2 of my Kashi visit. UP Government’s focus on animal welfare is commendable & will help farmers.pic.twitter.com/R429RL8y0s
Sharing my speech at the public meeting in Shahanshahpur.http://nm-4.com/i8f5
Saddened by the demise of Jayantibhai Barot. He was a long time colleague who devoted his life to serving the people of Gujarat. RIP.
ביום חיפה אני מצדיע לחיילים ההודים האמיצים שהקריבו חייהם לשחרר את העיר ב1918.pic.twitter.com/xTnFo5OLad
On Haifa Day I salute the brave Indian soldiers who laid down their lives to liberate Haifa in 1918.
Was pleased to visit Haifa and pay homage there in person in July.pic.twitter.com/qVH6rPPEsK
Incredible speech by EAM @SushmaSwaraj at the @UN! She has made India extremely proud at the world stage. http://nm-4.com/wdg5  #UNGA
EAM @SushmaSwaraj was insightful in identifying global challenges & strongly reiterated India's commitment to create a better planet. #UNGA
A strong message was given by @SushmaSwaraj Ji on the dangers of terrorism and why we have to unite and fight this menace. #UNGA
Do hear #MannKiBaat tomorrow at 11 AM.pic.twitter.com/ddbIiipoUC

Delighted to see #SwachhataHiSeva become a mass movement. I thank all those taking part. #MannKiBaathttps://soundcloud.com/narendramodi/the-swachhata-movement-has-gained-widespread-support-from-people …

पंडित दीनदयाल उपाध्याय जी की जयंती पर उन्हें शत् शत् नमन। Remembering our inspiration, Pandit Deendayal Upadhyaya ji on his Jayanti.
We pray to Skanda Mata on Navratri’s 5th day. May her blessings always guide us. Here is today’s Stuti. https://youtu.be/UEZq1Yats6I pic.twitter.com/WerOGwyBRk
Some glimpses from the BJP National Executive Meeting in Delhi.pic.twitter.com/dxDwqWZ28V
Will launch Saubhagya Yojana & inaugurate Deendayal Urja Bhawan. Programme starts at 6:30 PM. Watch on your phones. http://nm4.in/dnldapp pic.twitter.com/hViDMYva5P
#Saubhagya will brighten the lives of crores of Indians & give wings to India's development journey. http://nm-4.com/2og5
Even after 70 years of independence, there are crores of households without electricity. #Saubhagya changes that & brings a new era.
Elaborated on key reforms in the coal sector & power sector, which includes focus on production, transmission, distribution & connection.
With a thrust on equity, efficiency & sustainability, a new energy framework is being created that caters to the aspirations of a New India.
Inaugurated the Deendayal Urja Bhawan in Delhi.pic.twitter.com/LHCs1BPWXN
We pray to Mata Katyayani on Navratri’s 6th day. May her blessings give us strength & always protect us from evil. https://youtu.be/fkSxeGOUjpQ pic.twitter.com/5ge4iguY2X
Sourav Chakraborty from Tripura  penned his views on a @swachhbharat.pic.twitter.com/v3llbdf210
Warm birthday wishes to our former Prime Minister, Dr. Manmohan Singh. May he lead a long life filled with good health.
Happy to see wide scale participation by youngsters, including Arjun in #SwachhataHiSeva. Our Yuva Shakti will make a Swachh Bharat.https://twitter.com/sachin_rt/status/912485309228531712 …
The continued commitment of @sachin_rt towards a @swachhbharat is deeply appreciable. People across India will be inspired by his efforts.
I congratulate my young friend @AUThackeray for participating in a cleanliness initiative in Mumbai & adding momentum to #SwachhataHiSeva.
Discussed boosting economic cooperation between India and France with Mr. @PierreGattaz, President of @medef.http://nm-4.com/lug5
Met Mr. Jim Mattis, Secretary @DeptofDefense and discussed India-USA relations.pic.twitter.com/rx8c7ISmYa
Attended Valedictory Session of Assistant Secretaries. IAS officers of 2015 batch made detailed presentations on key policy related issues.
In my address, talked about GST, adoption of GeM, @swachhbharat Mission among other issues.http://nm-4.com/8sg5
7th day of Navratri is dedicated to Maa Kaalratri, who removes evil, negativity & ignorance. Here is a Stuti. https://youtu.be/YVi4L5ETL8w pic.twitter.com/vxuBwdIeCb

On #WorldTourismDay, I invite people from all over the world to come & discover the beauty of #IncredibleIndia & hospitality of our people.
I specially urge my young friends to travel across India & see first hand the diversity of our vibrant nation. #WorldTourismDay
